actions.name: Fearmonger

cost.trigger: A creature ends their activation within Range of the user, or attacks the user with a [Contact] attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: A creature ends their activation within Range of the user, or attacks the user with a [Contact] attack.
Effect: The triggering creature gains @Affliction[fear] 2, stacking with any @Affliction[fear] they previously had.
